about_the_game:
Listen to the gorgeously lush tracks and sounds from the fields, mountains, dunes and forests of Albamare, in Tumult Kollektiv's original soundtrack for Pine!

Featuring 29 delightful tracks straight from the game, and an additional 2 tracks from previously released trailers, you can now immerse yourself in the world of Albamare even when you're not playing. Dive into the soundscapes of all 5 factions of the island or dream away at the open, rich melodies of Albamare's biomes.

The OST, delivered in both .mp3 and .wav format, is composed by the talented musicians of Tumult Kollektiv: Jonathan Howe, Leonhard van Voorst and Alexander van der Kruijf.
detailed_description:
Listen to the gorgeously lush tracks and sounds from the fields, mountains, dunes and forests of Albamare, in Tumult Kollektiv's original soundtrack for Pine!

Featuring 29 delightful tracks straight from the game, and an additional 2 tracks from previously released trailers, you can now immerse yourself in the world of Albamare even when you're not playing. Dive into the soundscapes of all 5 factions of the island or dream away at the open, rich melodies of Albamare's biomes.

The OST, delivered in both .mp3 and .wav format, is composed by the talented musicians of Tumult Kollektiv: Jonathan Howe, Leonhard van Voorst and Alexander van der Kruijf.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit OS
  • Processor: Quad Core 3.2 Ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.9 or later
  • Processor: Quad Core 3.2 Ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or equal AMD Video Card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Pine (Original Game Soundtrack)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Quad Core 3.2 Ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

reviews:
“... the really outstanding soundtrack contributes a lot to Pine's great atmosphere.”
Gamestar

“The soundtrack is subtle but phenomenal.”
Escapist
short_description: This is the original soundtrack for open world action adventure game Pine, composed by Tumult Kollektiv.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
